targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "$Host.load.load.shortterm"
SELECT abs(last("value")*100/(1073741824*16)-100) FROM "$Host.memory.memory-free"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.nut-ups.percent-charge" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "$Host.uptime.uptime" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-backups.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-documents.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-downloads.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-backups-borg.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-home.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-home-claude.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-home-helene.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-minio.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-music.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-photo.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-piracy.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.df-mnt-storage-video.df_complex-used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.aggregation-cpu-sum.percent-interrupt" GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.aggregation-cpu-sum.percent-system" GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.aggregation-cpu-sum.percent-user" GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.aggregation-cpu-sum.percent-nice" GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.load.load.shortterm" GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.load.load.midterm" GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.load.load.longterm" GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("value") /10-273.15 FROM "$Host.cputemp-0.temperature" GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") /10-273.15 FROM "$Host.cputemp-1.temperature" GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") /10-273.15 FROM "$Host.cputemp-2.temperature" GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") /10-273.15 FROM "$Host.cputemp-3.temperature" GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.memory.memory-wired" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.memory.memory-inactive" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.memory.memory-laundry" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.memory.memory-active" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.memory.memory-free" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.swap.swap-free" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.swap.swap-used" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.interface-em0.if_octets.rx" GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.interface-em0.if_octets.tx" GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.processes.ps_state-blocked" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.processes.ps_state-zombies" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.processes.ps_state-stopped" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.processes.ps_state-running" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.processes.ps_state-sleeping" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.processes.ps_state-idle" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$Host.processes.ps_state-wait" GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "servers.freenas_xpander_ovh.disktemp-ada0.temperature" GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
